title: #PriceHikeFriday: Local & imported cement prices increase
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The price of a locally produced pack of cement was increased by Rs. 450/- on Friday (1) morning.
Moreover, a pack of imported cement was increased by Rs. 500/-.
Sri Lanka launches probe into extremist links on Mirihana Protest
Mirihana protestors cannot be charged under PTA – Human Rights Commission
